<<BR>>
 {*} This release we decided to spread the word about Ubuntu through all over Egypt. The idea is simple you can create your small event in your own university. We don't have any restrictions at all just mention ubuntu-eg and use their hash tags on different social media websites.
<<BR>>
 {*} To Help people attending your event, please fill in basic information, such as ''Location'', ''Date&Time'', ''Who's in charge'', and LOCo Team's Portal(LTP) entry so can ppl register to attend. Also, it can be useful for attendants to know what is going to happen during event(s).
